name: Webflow SEO Checklist - Notion Template
description: Drive more organic traffic faster with the Ultimate Webflow SEO Checklist. Why I created this checklist…I want you to be able to confidently say to a client 'yes this website is search engine optimised' without having to spend your own time down one of the many SEO rabbit holes. Trust me, there are a lot. So I've optimised the checklist for work vs potential reward. While most of the items are quick and easy to complete, there are a couple that are a bit more complex but promise greater organic
features: Checking all pages for title tags, meta description, open graph and more.; Configuring the most important ‘Project Settings’.; Structured Data and how to add schema markup.; Essential accessibility checks.; And more...
